allow: Bash("C:\Program Files\GitHub CLI\gh.exe" repo create vintaro-website --private --source=. --remote=origin --push)
Bash("C:\Program Files\GitHub CLI\gh.exe" api -X POST repos/Vintaro-GmbH/vintaro-website/pages -f source[branch]=master -f source[path]=/)
Bash("C:\Program Files\GitHub CLI\gh.exe" repo edit Vintaro-GmbH/vintaro-website --visibility public)
Bash("C:\Program Files\GitHub CLI\gh.exe" repo edit Vintaro-GmbH/vintaro-website --visibility public --accept-visibility-change-consequences)
Bash("C:\Program Files\GitHub CLI\gh.exe" repo view Vintaro-GmbH/vintaro-website)
